com.yantra.api.ycd

Interface modifyFulfillmentOptions

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    com.yantra.api.YCDApi, YIFApi

    public interface modifyFulfillmentOptions

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.w3c.dom.Document modifyFulfillmentOptions(YFSEnvironment env, org.w3c.dom.Document inXML) 

    • Method Detail

      • modifyFulfillmentOptions

        org.w3c.dom.Document modifyFulfillmentOptions(YFSEnvironment env,
                                              org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
                                       throws com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSException,
                                              java.rmi.RemoteException

        The modifyFulfullmentOptions API is a wrapper api of the changeOrder API. This api provides additional logic around changeOrder API and performs the following operations on the input xml before calling changeOrder API:

        • Clear the PersonInfoShipTo address on an Order line to blank if delivery method is changed to Pick Up or Carry
        • Clear the PersonInfoMarkFor address on an Order line to blank if delivery method is changed from Pick Up to something else
        • Set the ReqShipDate on an Order line to blank if delivery method is changed
        • Set the CarrierServiceCode on an Order line to blank if delivery method is changed to Pick Up or Carry
        • Set the Committed Dates for MIN_DELIVERY and MAX_DELIVERY for an Order line to blank if:
          • CarrierServiceCode is changed on a shipping line
          • Delivery method is changed from Shipping to something else
          • Delivery method is changed to Shipping

        This API will unschedule order lines whose status falls between Scheduled and Included in Shipment if any one of the following attributes are modified on the order line.

        • CarrierServiceCode
        • DeliveryMethod
        • ReqShipDate
        • ShipNode
        • ShipToKey
        Additionally, all the shipments associated with the order line will be deleted if the order line which is getting modified is in Included in Shipment Status. Once the order lines are unscheduled, the reserveOrder API will be called internally to reserve the inventory on the order lines before any modification is performed on the order line. Also, whenever the delivery method of an order line is changed from DEL to any other delivery method, the modifyWorkOrder API is called internally to dissociate any work order associated with the order line.

        Related Yantra Documents
        Input XML Input DTD Output XML Output DTD Error XML Error DTD


        Please refer to the changeOrder API for any additional user exits.

        Events Raised: Please refer to the changeOrder API for a list of raised events.

        Audits: Please refer to the changeOrder API for a list of audits.

        Pre-conditions: Provided order details should be valid.

        Post-conditions: None

        Output Template Support: Yes

        Database Extensibility Support: Yes

        Configuration Required for Backward Compatibility: No

        Parameters:
        env - Required. Environment handle returned by the createEnvironment API.
        inXML - Required. For more information, see the associated input xml files.

        Returns:
        An XML document that contains the order details. For details on the output, refer to the associated output files.

        Throws:
        com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSException - Yantra exception containing error codes in the standard error files.
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Java's default remote exception handler.
